title: Alien DDK Cuts
description:
The DDK Fan edits of the Alien series are a labour of love.

Created primarily for personal enjoyment, they are the versions of these great movies I always wanted.

A mixture of Theatrical, Special Edition/Assembly, and Unused material, the DDK cuts represent the versions of these wonderful films that I feel represent the best possible representations of each film.

Each have have numerous additions, removals, tweaks, colour corrections, musical changes, editing re-arrangements and minor special effects changes.

Alien is mostly made up of the Theatrical cut of the film, with some scenes from the Director's Cut/re-release swapped in.

Aliens has some significant changes. 
Mostly comprised of the Extended cut, the film is presented in a 2.35:1 aspect ratio to match the other three films. 
Aliens has been heavily colour corrected to provide a deeper, inkier image, deeper blacks, stronger colour saturation, while retaining the original, grainy master.
Aliens has some re-arrangements in terms of editing during the fight with the Queen to fix continuity errors with the placement of the Power-loader hands, and the original, unused climax music has been used instead of the re-used action queue from just a scene earlier in the film.

Alien3 is essentially a 50/50 mix of Theatrical and Assembly cut. 
Significant colour-correction, music/sound mixing and post-processing has been done to clean up (as best as possible) the puppet shots in the film.
The only CGI shot in the film (the Dragon's head cracking) has been removed.
Pulse rifles have been tweaked to sound as they should.
The Dog is the host for the dragon.
The Queen emerges from Ripley during her suicide.

Alien Resurrection is mostly comprised of the Extended cut, but retains the beautiful, Theatrical opening credits, and end scene.

These cuts are in Stereo, and I recommend watching them using Dolby Digital if you have a surround sound system.

It goes without saying but make sure you have full 0-255 RGB on your display.

You must own legal copies of the Alien Bluray series to enjoy these fan edits.
